Articles.Content:
hi, i am currently trying to add a sabre function to a radial nuke engine made by 'Mysteel Callsignsaru'.

I am not sure if just blatently copying the code for the RAPIER engine into the RN-614 medium .cfg file is right, but i have no other means of making the engine run just on IntakeAir in atmosphere and allow auto switching to liquid fuel for space.

I know bigger mods allow thermal rockets (KSPI) or change the fuel type to hydrogen (Near future tech has that, i like that idea but the tanks that come with are not lander friendly and i suck at textures and moddling);

but what i want to do is just have a basic lightweight 42kn radial busard ram nuclear engine for SSTO's, is that so much to ask?!
Blatantly copy it, but change the values until they're balanced. As long as you say that it's from the config of a stock part no one should mind.
